scripts.merge:reports: npm run clean:reports; npm run cy:run; mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/full_report.json
scripts.generate:report:without:e2e:exec: npm run merge:reports:without:e2e:exec; marge cypress/reports/full_report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --reportFilename full_report.html; npm run report:copyScreenshots
scripts.generate:report: npm run merge:reports; marge cypress/reports/full_report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --reportFilename full_report.html; npm run report:copyScreenshots
